topic.title: Update to use the Maven Bill of Materials (BOM)

body.p: A bill of materials (BOM) is a list of the parts or components that are required to build a product. BOMs are ordinary pom.xml files — they contain no source code and their only purpose is to declare their bundled modules.

note.p: It is highly recommended to use bill of materials (BOM) to manage project dependencies, as it simplifies dependency management by organizing a group of dependencies under a single version.
